newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Lehman ups Broderbund.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Lehman ups Broderbund.

text.p: -- Lehman Brothers analyst Michael Stanek said he raised Broderbund Software Inc to buy from outperform, and raised his 1997 year earnings estimate on the company to $1.47 per share from $1.42.
-- He left his 1998 estimate unchanged at $1.75 on revenues of $251 million.

-- In published comments, Stanek said that, "We believe the worst is over for Broderbund. With a huge product upgrade coming in late summer we believe we may see significant upside to FY97 and FY98 estimates."
-- The target price on the stock is $40. In early trading Friday, the stock was up 1-3/8 to 33.
